definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]

sentences.english: Good figure and mild temper make her loved by all.
sentences.chinese: 姣好的身姿和温婉的性格使她深受爱护。

sentences.english: So sweet and tender, as is any Southern Song.
sentences.chinese: 甜蜜而又温婉，正是南歌子的特点。

sentences.english: March breeze, gentle touching, Hing Wah Street West foot Spinning Dance.
sentences.chinese: 三月的微风，温婉缠绵，踮脚旋舞。

sentences.english: Even more…A moon-like lake encompasses an oasis, and a Buddhist temple sits on the green.
sentences.chinese: 还有月牙一样的清泉，温婉地包绕着沙漠上的寺庙。

sentences.english: At this time, clean-washed, gentle moving.
sentences.chinese: 此时，月华如水，温婉动人。

definition: lucid and elegant/quiet and exquisite/clear and attractive style
pretty daughter in a humble family
(of a person's manner or character) gentle and quiet
tender and soft as water/deeply attached to sb
